text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 16 in G major, Op. 31, No. 1, is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written between 1801 and 1802 and published in 1803. The sonata is approximately 24 minutes long. Tovey, D.F. (1931) Commentary on Beethoven's Piano Sonatas, London, ABRSM.Ball, P. (2010) The Music Instinct, London, The Bodley Head ==Form== The sonata is in three movements: ==References== Category:Compositions in G major Piano Sonata 016
title: Piano Sonata No. 16 (Beethoven)
